question: 9. একটি কাঠের টুকরোর দৈর্ঘ্য আরেকটি টুকরোর দৈর্ঘ্যের ৩ গুণ। টুকরো দুটো সংযুক্ত করা হলে সংযুক্ত টুকরোটির দৈর্ঘ্য ছোট টুকরোর চেয়ে কতগুণ বড় হবে?

question: 24. The best passive form of the sentence: ‘We don’t like idle people’-

answers.text: A. we are not liked by idle people
B. Idle people are not like us
C. Idle people are not liked by us
D. Idle people are not of our liking

correct_answer: C. Idle people are not liked by us

question: 25. The correct sentence of the followings-

correct_answer: D. The Nile is the longest river in Africa
